document.full_text: iran's supreme leader ayatollah ali khamenei rejected the resignation of intelligence minister heydar moslehi on sunday, said the isna news agency, in a move seen as a rare political disagreement between iran's top rulers.
document.title: iran's khamenei rejects minister's resignation: report
lines_and_colors: iran's supreme leader ayatollah ali khamenei rejected the resignation of intelligence minister heydar moslehi on sunday, said the isna news agency, in a move seen as a rare political disagreement between iran's top rulers.
